docs.title: How to print the report using external button | Reports
docs.content:
## How to print the report using the external button

You can print the report with external button using [`Print`](../../javascript-reporting/report-viewer/api-reference/methods/#print) method.

### See also

[How to hide the print button from Report viewer toolbar](../../javascript-reporting/report-viewer/toolbar-customization/#hide-toolbar-items)
docs.description: This section briefly describes how to do a print action in Report Viewer control using the external button in Bold Reports.
